Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Rosecrest Street, east of the Fairy Dust Inn.
Room.LongDescription: The Fairy Dust Inn is a small inn and tavern where people coming in from the ocean entrance to Oceancrest can get a good night sleep without paying a fortune or walking a long distance to many of the other inns near the land entrances to town.
